description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nGlaive of Hungering:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it deals damage to a random enemy equal to 35% of the attack's damage and heals itself for 100% of this damage. This effect repeats once for each {RACE_Hunter} fighting on your side.
name: Light Glaive
